020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal;
021
022import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
023import static java.util.Collections.addAll;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.hash;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireValidArgument;
030
031import javax.lang.model.element.ExecutableElement;
032import javax.lang.model.element.Modifier;
033import javax.lang.model.element.VariableElement;
034import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
035import java.lang.reflect.Method;
036import java.lang.reflect.Parameter;
037import java.lang.reflect.Type;
038import java.util.ArrayList;
039import java.util.Collection;
040import java.util.EnumSet;
041import java.util.List;
042import java.util.Optional;
043import java.util.Set;
044
045import org.apiguardian.api.API;
046import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.UnexpectedExceptionError;
048import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec;
049import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ClassName;
050import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.CodeBlock;
051import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.JavaComposer;
052import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ParameterSpec;
053import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
054import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Lazy;
055import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.JavaUtils;

057/**
058 *  The implementation of
059 *  {@link ParameterSpec}.
060 *
061 *  @author Square,Inc.
062 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
063 *  @version $Id: ParameterSpecImpl.java 1065 2023-09-28 06:16:50Z tquadrat $
064 *  @since 0.0.5
065 *
066 *  @UMLGraph.link
067 */
068@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ParameterSpecImpl.java 1065 2023-09-28 06:16:50Z tquadrat $" )
069@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
070public final class ParameterSpecImpl implements ParameterSpec
071{
072        /*---------------*\
073    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
074        \*---------------*/
075    /**
076     *  The implementation of
077     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ParameterSpec.Builder}
078     *
079     *  @author Square,Inc.
080     *  @modified   Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
081     *  @version $Id: ParameterSpecImpl.java 1065 2023-09-28 06:16:50Z tquadrat $
082     *  @since 0.0.5
083     *
084     *  @UMLGraph.link
085     */
086    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ParameterSpecImpl.java 1065 2023-09-28 06:16:50Z tquadrat $" )
087    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
088    public static final class BuilderImpl implements ParameterSpec.Builder
089    {
090            /*------------*\
091        ====** Attributes **===================================================
092            \*------------*/
093        /**
094         *  The annotations for the parameter.
095         */
096        private final Collection<AnnotationSpecImpl> m_Annotations = new ArrayList<>();
097
098        /**
099         *  The reference to the factory.
100         */
101        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
102        private final JavaComposer m_Composer;
103
104        /**
105         *  The Javadoc comment for the parameter.
106         */
107        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
108        private final CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl m_Javadoc;
109
110        /**
111         *  The modifiers for the parameter.
112         */
113        private final Set<Modifier> m_Modifiers = EnumSet.noneOf( Modifier.class );
114
115        /**
116         *  The name for the parameter.
117         */
118        private final String m_Name;
119
120        /**
121         *  The type for the parameter.
122         */
123        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
124        private final TypeNameImpl m_Type;
125
126            /*--------------*\
127        ====** Constructors **=================================================
128            \*--------------*/
129        /**
130         *  Creates a new {@code BuilderImpl} instance.
131         *
132         *  @param  composer    The reference to the factory that created this
133         *      builder instance.
134         *  @param  type    The type for the new parameter.
135         *  @param  name    The name for the new parameter.
136         */
137        public BuilderImpl( @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" ) final JavaComposer composer, final TypeName type, final CharSequence name )
138        {
139            m_Composer = requireNonNullArgument( composer, "composer" );
140            m_Type = (TypeNameImpl) requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" );
141            m_Name = requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ).toString().intern();
142
143            m_Javadoc = (CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl) m_Composer.codeBlockBuilder();
144        }   //  BuilderImpl()
145
146            /*---------*\
147        ====** Methods **======================================================
148            \*---------*/
149        /**
150         *  {@inheritDoc}
151         */
152        @Override
153        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final AnnotationSpec annotationSpec )
154        {
155            m_Annotations.add( (AnnotationSpecImpl) requireNonNullArgument( annotationSpec, "annotationSpec" ) );
156
157            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
158            return this;
159        }   //  addAnnotation()
160
161        /**
162         *  {@inheritDoc}
163         */
164        @Override
165        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final Class<?> annotation )
166        {
167            return addAnnotation( ClassNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( annotation, "annotation" ) ) );
168        }   //  addAnnotation()
169
170        /**
171         *  {@inheritDoc}
172         */
173        @Override
174        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final ClassName annotationClassName )
175        {
176            final var annotation = (AnnotationSpecImpl) m_Composer.annotationBuilder( requireNonNullArgument( annotationClassName, "annotationClassName" ) )
177                .build();
178            m_Annotations.add( annotation );
179
180            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
181            return this;
182        }   //  addAnnotation()
183
184        /**
185         *  {@inheritDoc}
186         */
187        @Override
188        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotations( final Iterable<AnnotationSpec> annotationSpecs )
189        {
190            for( final var annotationSpec : requireNonNullArgument( annotationSpecs, "annotationSpecs" ) )
191            {
192                m_Annotations.add( (AnnotationSpecImpl) annotationSpec );
193            }
194
195            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
196            return this;
197        }   //  addAnnotations()
198
199        /**
200         *  {@inheritDoc}
201         */
202        @Override
203        public final BuilderImpl addJavadoc( final CodeBlock block )
204        {
205            m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( block );
206
207            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
208            return this;
209        }   //  addJavadoc()
210
211        /**
212         *  {@inheritDoc}
213         */
214        @Override
215        public final BuilderImpl addJavadoc( final String format, final Object... args )
216        {
217            m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( format, args );
218
219            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
220            return this;
221        }   //  addJavadoc()
222
223        /**
224         *  {@inheritDoc}
225         */
226        @SuppressWarnings( {"BoundedWildcard"} )
227        @Override
228        public final BuilderImpl addModifiers( final Iterable<Modifier> modifiers )
229        {
230            for( final var modifier : requireNonNullArgument( modifiers, "modifiers" ) )
231            {
232                m_Modifiers.add( modifier );
233            }
234
235            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
236            return this;
237        }   //  addModifiers()
238
239        /**
240         *  {@inheritDoc}
241         */
242        @Override
243        public final BuilderImpl addModifiers( final Modifier... modifiers )
244        {
245            addAll( m_Modifiers, requireNonNullArgument( modifiers, "modifiers" ) );
246
247            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
248            return this;
249        }   //  addModifiers()
250
251        /**
252         *  {@inheritDoc}
253         */
254        @Override
255        public final ParameterSpecImpl build() { return new ParameterSpecImpl( this ); }
256    }
257    //  class Builder
258
259        /*------------*\
260    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
261        \*------------*/
262    /**
263     *  The annotations of this parameter.
264     */
265    private final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> m_Annotations;
266
267    /**
268     *  Lazily initialised return value of
269     *  {@link #toString()}
270     *  for this instance.
271     */
272    private final Lazy<String> m_CachedString;
273
274    /**
275     *  The reference to the factory.
276     */
277    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
278    private final JavaComposer m_Composer;
279
280    /**
281     *  The Javadoc comment for this type.
282     */
283    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
284    private final CodeBlockImpl m_Javadoc;
285
286    /**
287     *  The modifiers of this parameter.
288     */
289    private final Set<Modifier> m_Modifiers;
290
291    /**
292     *  The name of this parameter.
293     */
294    private final String m_Name;
295
296    /**
297     *  The type of this parameter.
298     */
299    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
300    private final TypeNameImpl m_Type;
301
302        /*--------------*\
303    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
304        \*--------------*/
305    /**
306     *  Creates a new {@code ParameterSpecImpl} instance.
307     *
308     *  @param  builder The builder.
309     */
310    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject"} )
311    public ParameterSpecImpl( @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" ) final BuilderImpl builder )
312    {
313        m_Composer = builder.m_Composer;
314        m_Name = builder.m_Name;
315        m_Annotations = List.copyOf( builder.m_Annotations );
316        m_Javadoc = builder.m_Javadoc.build();
317        m_Modifiers = Set.copyOf( builder.m_Modifiers );
318        m_Type = builder.m_Type;
319
320        m_CachedString = Lazy.use( this::initializeCachedString );
321    }   //  ParameterSpecImpl()
322
323        /*---------*\
324    ====** Methods **==========================================================
325        \*---------*/
326    /**
327     *  Creates a builder for a new
328     *  {@code ParameterSpecImpl}
329     *  instance.
330     *
331     *  @param  type    The type of the new parameter.
332     *  @param  name    The name of the new parameter.
333     *  @param  modifiers   The modifiers for the new parameter.
334     *  @return The builder.
335     *
336     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
337     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
338     */
339    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
340    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
341    public static final BuilderImpl builder( final Type type, final CharSequence name, final Modifier... modifiers )
342    {
343        return builder( TypeNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ) ), name, modifiers );
344    }   //  builder()
345
346    /**
347     *  Creates a builder for a new
348     *  {@code ParameterSpec}
349     *  instance.
350     *
351     *  @param  type    The type of the new parameter.
352     *  @param  name    The name of the new parameter.
353     *  @param  modifiers   The modifiers for the new parameter.
354     *  @return The builder.
355     *
356     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
357     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
358     */
359    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
360    public static final BuilderImpl builder( final TypeName type, final CharSequence name, final Modifier... modifiers )
361    {
362        final var composer = new JavaComposer();
363        final var retValue = new BuilderImpl( composer, type, requireValidArgument( name, "name", JavaUtils::isValidName, "not a valid name: %s"::formatted ) )
364            .addModifiers( modifiers );
365
366        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
367        return retValue;
368    }   //  builder()
369
370    /**
371     *  Emits the parameter to the given code writer.
372     *
373     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
374     *  @param  varargs {@code true} if this parameter is a {@code vararg}
375     *      parameter, {@code false} if it is a regular parameter.
376     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
377     *      output target.
378     */
379    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface"} )
380    public final void emit( @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" ) final CodeWriter codeWriter, final boolean varargs ) throws UncheckedIOException
381    {
382        codeWriter.emitAnnotations( m_Annotations, true );
383        codeWriter.emitModifiers( m_Modifiers );
384        if( varargs )
385        {
386            /*
387             * varargs is true, so m_Type must be an array, and
388             * TypeNameImpl.asArray() returns a non-empty Optional …
389             */
390            //noinspection OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent
391            TypeNameImpl.asArray( m_Type ).get().emit( codeWriter, true );
392        }
393        else
394        {
395            m_Type.emit( codeWriter );
396        }
397        codeWriter.emit( " $L", m_Name );
398    }   //  emit()
399
400    /**
401     *  {@inheritDoc}
402     */
403    @Override
404    public final boolean equals( final Object o )
405    {
406        var retValue = this == o;
407        if( !retValue && (o instanceof final ParameterSpecImpl other) )
408        {
409            retValue = m_Composer.equals( other.m_Composer )
410                && toString().equals( other.toString() )
411                && m_Javadoc.equals( other.m_Javadoc );
412        }
413
414        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
415        return retValue;
416    }   //  equals()
417
418    /**
419     *  Creates an instance of {@code ParameterSpec} from the given
420     *  {@link VariableElement}
421     *  instance.
422     *
423     *  @param  element The variable element.
424     *  @return The parameter spec.
425     *
426     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
427     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
428     */
429    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
430    public static final ParameterSpecImpl get( final VariableElement element )
431    {
432        final var composer = new JavaComposer();
433        final var retValue = (ParameterSpecImpl) composer.createParameter( element );
434
435        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
436        return retValue;
437    }   //  get()
438
439    /**
440     *  Creates an instance of {@code ParameterSpec} from the given
441     *  {@link Parameter}
442     *  instance.
443     *
444     *  @param  parameter The variable element.
445     *  @return The parameter spec.
446     *
447     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
448     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
449     */
450    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
451    public static final ParameterSpecImpl get( final Parameter parameter )
452    {
453        final var composer = new JavaComposer();
454        final var retValue = (ParameterSpecImpl) composer.createParameter( parameter );
455
456        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
457        return retValue;
458    }   //  get()
459
460    /**
461     *  Returns the
462     *  {@link JavaComposer}
463     *  factory.
464     *
465     *  @return The reference to the factory.
466     */
467    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface"} )
468    public final JavaComposer getFactory() { return m_Composer; }
469
470    /**
471     *  {@inheritDoc}
472     */
473    @Override
474    public final int hashCode()
475    {
476        final var retValue = hash( m_Composer, toString(), m_Javadoc );
477
478        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
479        return retValue;
480    }   //  hashCode()
481
482    /**
483     *  {@inheritDoc}
484     */
485    @Override
486    public final boolean hasModifier( final Modifier modifier ) { return m_Modifiers.contains( requireNonNullArgument( modifier, "modifier" ) ); }
487
488    /**
489     *  The initializer for
490     *  {@link #m_CachedString}.
491     *
492     *  @return The return value for
493     *      {@link #toString()}.
494     */
495    private final String initializeCachedString()
496    {
497        final var resultBuilder = new StringBuilder();
498        final var codeWriter = new CodeWriter( m_Composer, resultBuilder );
499        try
500        {
501            emit( codeWriter, false );
502        }
503        catch( final UncheckedIOException e )
504        {
505            throw new UnexpectedExceptionError( e.getCause() );
506        }
507        final var retValue = resultBuilder.toString();
508
509        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
510        return retValue;
511    }   //  initializeCachedString()
512
513    /**
514     *  Returns the Javadoc comment for this parameter.
515     *
516     *  @return An instance of
517     *      {@link Optional}
518     *      that holds the JavaDoc comment.
519     */
520    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
521    public final Optional<CodeBlock> javadoc()
522    {
523        final var comment = m_Javadoc.isEmpty() ? null : m_Composer.codeBlockOf( "\n@param $N $L", this, m_Javadoc );
524        final var retValue = Optional.ofNullable( comment );
525
526        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
527        return retValue;
528    }   //  javadoc()
529
530    /**
531     *  {@inheritDoc}
532     */
533    @Override
534    public final String name() { return m_Name; }
535
536    /**
537     *  Creates a new
538     *  {@code ParameterSpec}
539     *  instance for the given arguments.
540     *
541     *  @param  type    The type of the new parameter.
542     *  @param  name    The name of the new parameter.
543     *  @param  modifiers   The modifiers for the new parameter.
544     *  @return The parameter specification.
545     *
546     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
547     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
548     */
549    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
550    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
551    public static final ParameterSpecImpl of( final Type type, final CharSequence name, final Modifier... modifiers )
552    {
553        return of( TypeNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ) ), name, modifiers );
554    }   //  of()
555
556    /**
557     *  Creates a new
558     *  {@code ParameterSpec}
559     *  instance for the given arguments.
560     *
561     *  @param  type    The type of the new parameter.
562     *  @param  name    The name of the new parameter.
563     *  @param  modifiers   The modifiers for the new parameter.
564     *  @return The parameter specification.
565     *
566     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
567     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
568     */
569    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
570    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
571    public static final ParameterSpecImpl of( final TypeName type, final CharSequence name, final Modifier... modifiers )
572    {
573        final var retValue = builder( type, name ).addModifiers( modifiers ).build();
574
575        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
576        return retValue;
577    }   //  of()
578
579    /**
580     *  Retrieves the parameters from the given method.
581     *
582     *  @param  method  The method.
583     *  @return The parameters of the given method; the returned list can be
584     *      empty, but it will not be {@code null}.
585     *
586     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
587     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
588     */
589    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
590    @SuppressWarnings( "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass" )
591    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
592    public static final List<ParameterSpecImpl> parametersOf( final ExecutableElement method )
593    {
594        final var retValue = method.getParameters().stream()
595            .map( ParameterSpecImpl::get )
596            .toList();
597
598        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
599        return retValue;
600    }   //  parametersOf()
601
602    /**
603     *  Retrieves the parameters from the given method.
604     *
605     *  @param  method  The method.
606     *  @return The parameters of the given method; the returned list can be
607     *      empty, but it will not be {@code null}.
608     *
609     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
610     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
611     */
612    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
613    @SuppressWarnings( "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass" )
614    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.8" )
615    public static final List<ParameterSpecImpl> parametersOf( final Method method )
616    {
617        final var retValue = stream( method.getParameters() )
618            .map( ParameterSpecImpl::get )
619            .toList();
620
621        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
622        return retValue;
623    }   //  parametersOf()
624
625    /**
626     *  {@inheritDoc}
627     */
628    @Override
629    public final BuilderImpl toBuilder()
630    {
631        final var retValue = toBuilder( m_Type, m_Name, true );
632
633        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
634        return retValue;
635    }   //  toBuilder()
636
637    /**
638     *  {@inheritDoc}
639     */
640    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject"} )
641    @Override
642    public final BuilderImpl toBuilder( final TypeName type, final CharSequence name, final boolean keepJavadoc )
643    {
644        final var retValue = new BuilderImpl( m_Composer, type, name );
645        retValue.m_Annotations.addAll( m_Annotations );
646        retValue.m_Modifiers.addAll( m_Modifiers );
647        if( keepJavadoc ) retValue.m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( m_Javadoc );
648
649        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
650        return retValue;
651    }   //  toBuilder()
652
653    /**
654     *  {@inheritDoc}
655     */
656    @Override
657    public final String toString() { return m_CachedString.get(); }
658
659    /**
660     *  {@inheritDoc}
661     */
662    @Override
663    public final TypeNameImpl type() { return m_Type; }
664}
665//  class ParameterSpecImpl
666
667/*
668 *  End of File
669 */
